Mechanism (short): NMDA Glycine Site (activator), CaMKII (activator), PKCα (activator), AMPA (indirect), ACh (releaser)

Primary effects (summary): Mood stabilization, neuroprotection, promotes neurogenesis, cognitive support, stress resilience, potential longevity benefits
Mechanism (short): Inhibits glycogen synthase kinase-3β (GSK-3β), upregulates BDNF and IGF-1, stimulates hippocampal neurogenesis, modulates glutamate (keeps levels stable), protects neurons from glutamate-induced NMDA excitotoxicity, promotes cytoprotective B-cell activity, reduces neurological deficits, orotate form may have higher bioavailability than carbonate, low-dose (5-20mg vs 900-1800mg carbonate)
Acute effect after one dose?: Moderate - mood effects build gradually over days-weeks of consistent use
Onset/Peak/Duration: Onset: Gradual (days-weeks); Peak: Sustained with use; Duration: 24 hrs (long half-life)
Voxra (Bupropion) Interaction: LOW-MEDIUM: No major interaction - LOW-MEDIUM risk. Lithium (GSK-3β inhibitor). No direct monoamine reuptake. Both used for mood disorders. Orotate form is low-dose vs prescription lithium carbonate. Monitor mood effects. Generally safe at supplement doses.
SSRI (Escitalopram 10mg) Interaction: LOW-MEDIUM: No major interaction - LOW-MEDIUM risk. Lithium augmentation of SSRIs is established practice for treatment-resistant depression. Low-dose orotate form safer than prescription lithium. Monitor for lithium side effects (tremor, GI upset), though rare at supplement doses. Serotonin syndrome risk is low.
Evidence Summary: Mood stabilization, neuroprotection, promotes neurogenesis, cognitive support, stress resilience, potential longevity benefits

Primary effects (summary): Memory enhancement, cognitive improvement, learning enhancement, neuroprotection, reverses cognitive aging (9 years in human study), increases synaptic density and plasticity
Mechanism (short): Unique magnesium form crossing BBB efficiently (developed at MIT), elevates brain/CSF magnesium 7-15%, threonate from vitamin C metabolism, increases synaptic density and plasticity, enhances NMDA receptor function, increases BDNF, reduces neuroinflammation (inhibits NF-κB, reduces TNF-α/IL-1β/IL-6), strengthens BBB integrity, L-threonic acid naturally occurs in brain/plasma/foods
Acute effect after one dose?: Moderate - some acute cognitive effects, optimal neuroplasticity benefits with daily use over weeks-months
Onset/Peak/Duration: Onset: Gradual (weeks); Peak: Sustained with use; Duration: Sustained with use
Voxra (Bupropion) Interaction: LOW: No major interaction - LOW risk. Magnesium L-threonate provides magnesium supplementation. No monoamine effects. Safe combination.
SSRI (Escitalopram 10mg) Interaction: LOW: No major interaction - LOW risk. Magnesium supplementation. Safe with SSRIs.
Evidence Summary: Memory enhancement, cognitive improvement, learning enhancement, neuroprotection, reverses cognitive aging (9 years in human study), increases synaptic density and plasticity

Primary effects (summary): Memory enhancement, mood improvement, neuroprotection, anti-aging, increased mental energy
Mechanism (short): Mitochondrial electron transport chain enhancer, MAO inhibitor, acetylcholinesterase inhibitor, increases serotonin/norepinephrine/dopamine, powerful antioxidant, nitric oxide synthase inhibitor
Acute effect after one dose?: Yes - cognitive effects within 30-60 minutes, hormetic dose-response (low doses beneficial)
Onset/Peak/Duration: Onset: 30-60 min; Peak: 2 hrs; Duration: >20 hrs
Voxra (Bupropion) Interaction: LOW-MEDIUM: Yes - LOW-MEDIUM risk. MAO inhibitor (weak) and acetylcholinesterase inhibitor. Voxra is NDRI. MAO inhibition is mild at nootropic doses (<2mg), but at higher doses (>5mg) poses serotonin syndrome risk with any serotonergic agent. At low doses generally safe with Voxra.
SSRI (Escitalopram 10mg) Interaction: MEDIUM-HIGH: Yes - MEDIUM-HIGH risk. Methylene blue is MAO inhibitor. Combined with SSRI poses serotonin syndrome risk, especially at doses >5mg. FDA warning exists. At very low nootropic doses (<1mg) risk is minimal, but caution advised. Monitor for confusion, agitation, hypertermia, tremor.
Evidence Summary: Memory enhancement, mood improvement, neuroprotection, anti-aging, increased mental energy
